original: te'smābhirevaṃvidhāt saṃsārāṭavīkāntāradurgāduttārayitavyā abhayapure ca sarvajñatānagare nirupadrave nirupatāpe pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ |
analyzed: te smābhiḥ evaṃvidhāt saṃsāra aṭavī kāntāra durgāt uttārayitavyāḥ abhayapure ca sarvajña tā nagare nirupadrave nirupatāpe pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ

original: mahaughormyāmathairnimagnā bateme sattvāḥ kāmabhavāvidyādṛṣṭyoghasamavasṛṣṭāḥ saṃsārasrotonuvāhinastṛṣṇānadīprapannā mahāvegagrastā avilokanasamarthāḥ kāmavyāpādavihiṃsāvitarkapratānānucaritāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭyudakarākṣasagṛhītāḥ kāmagahanāvartānupraviṣṭā nandīrāgamadhyasaṃchannā asmimānasthalotsannā dauḥśīlyaviṣamācārāntaḥpuṭībhūtāḥ ṣaḍāyatanagrāmabhayatīramanuccalitāḥ kuśalasaṃtārakavirahitā anāthā aparāyaṇā aśaraṇāḥ |
analyzed: mahā ogha ūrmi āmathaiḥ nimagnāḥ bata ime sattvāḥ kāma bhava avidyā dṛṣṭi ogha samavasṛṣṭāḥ saṃsāra srotaḥ nuvāhinaḥ tṛṣṇā nadī prapannāḥ mahā vega grastāḥ a vilokana samarthāḥ kāma vyāpāda vihiṃsā vitarka pratāna anucaritāḥ satkāya dṛṣṭi udaka rākṣasa gṛhītāḥ kāma gahana āvarta anupraviṣṭāḥ nandī rāga madhya saṃchannāḥ asmimāna sthala utsannāḥ dauḥśīlya viṣama ācāra antaḥpuṭībhūtāḥ ṣaṣ

original: te'smābhirmahākaruṇākuśalamūlabalenoddhṛtya nirupadrave'rajasi kṣeme śive'bhaye sarvabhayatrāsāpagate sarvajñatāratnadvīpe pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ
analyzed: te smābhiḥ mahā karuṇā kuśala mūla balena uddhṛtya nirupadrave rajasi kṣeme śive bhaye sarva bhaya trāsa apagate sarvajña tā ratna dvīpe pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ

original: ruddhā bateme sattvā bahuduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsabahule'nunayapratighapriyāpriyavinibandhane saśokaparidevānucarite tṛṣṇānigaḍabandhane māyāśāṭhyāvidyāgahanasaṃchanne traidhātukacārake |
analyzed: ruddhāḥ bata ime sattvāḥ bahu duḥkha daurmanasya upāyāsa bahu lenu naya pratigha priya apriya vinibandhane sa śoka parideva anucarite tṛṣṇā nigaḍa bandhane māyā śāṭhya avidyā gahana saṃchanne traidhātuka cārake
te smābhiḥ sarva traidhātuka viveke sarva duḥkha upaśamena āvaraṇa nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ

ātma ātmīya abhiniviṣṭāḥ bata ime sattvāḥ skandhālaya an uccalitāḥ catur viparyāsa anuprayātāḥ ṣaṣ āyatana śūnya grāma saṃniśritāḥ catur mahābhūta uraga abhidrutāḥ skandha vadhaka taskara abhighātitāḥ aparimāṇa duḥkha pratisaṃvedinaḥ

original: te'smābhiḥ paramasukhe sarvaniketavigame pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā yaduta sarvāvaraṇaprahāṇanirvāṇe |
analyzed: te smābhiḥ parama sukhe sarva niketa vigame pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ yat uta sarva āvaraṇa prahāṇa nirvāṇe

original: hīnalīnadīnādhimuktā bateme sattvā agryasarvajñajñānacittavikalāḥ sati niḥsaraṇe mahāyāne śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānāvatīrṇamatayaḥ |
analyzed: hīna līna dīna adhimuktāḥ bata ime sattvāḥ agrya sarvajña jñāna citta vikalāḥ sati niḥsaraṇe mahāyāne śrāvaka pratyekabuddha yāna avatīrṇa matayaḥ
te smābhiḥ udāra buddha dharma mati vipula adhyālambena sarvajña jñāna locana tayā anuttare mahāyāne pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ

original: iti hi bhavanto jinaputrā evaṃ śīlabalādhānānugatasya bodhisattvasya kṛpākaruṇāmaitryabhinirhārakuśalasya sarvasattvānavadhīṣṭakalyāṇamitrasyāparityaktasarvasattvasya kriyākriyābhinirhārakuśalasya vimalāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhitasya bahavo buddhā ābhāsabhāgacchānti...audārika...peyālaṃ...pariṇāmayati tāṃśca tathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān paryupāsate,
analyzed: iti hi bhavantaḥ jinaputrāḥ evam śīla bala ādhāna anugatasya bodhisattvasya kṛpā karuṇā maitrī abhinirhāra kuśalasya sarva sattva an avadhīṣṭa kalyāṇa mitrasya a parityakta sarva sattvasya kriyā akriyā abhinirhāra kuśalasya vimalāyām bodhisattva bhūmau pratiṣṭhitasya bahavaḥ buddhāḥ ābhāsa bhāga chānti audārika peyā alaṃpariṇāmayati tān ca tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān paryupāsate

original: teṣāṃ ca sakāśebhyo gauraveṇemāneva daśa kuśalān karmapathān pratigṛhṇāti,
analyzed: teṣām ca sakāśebhyaḥ gauraveṇa imān eva daśa kuśalān karma pathān pratigṛhṇāti
yathā a pratigṛhītān ca na antarā praṇāśayati

original: so'nekān kalpānanekāni kalpaśatāni anekāni kalpasahasrāṇi anekāni kalpaśatasahasrāṇi anekāni kalpaniyutaśatasahasrāni anekakalpakoṭīranekānikalpakoṭiśatāni anekāni kalpakoṭiśatasahasrāni anekāni kalpakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi mātsaryadauḥśīlyamalāpanītatayā tyāgaśīlaviśuddhau samudāgacchati |
analyzed: saḥ u ekān kalpān anekāni kalpa śatāni anekāni kalpa sahasrāṇi anekāni kalpa śata sahasrāṇi anekāni kalpa niyuta śata sahasrāni aneka kalpa koṭīḥ anekāni kalpa koṭi śatāni anekāni kalpa koṭi śata sahasrāni anekāni kalpa koṭi niyuta śata sahasrāṇi mātsarya dauḥśīlya mala apanīta tayā tyāga śīla viśuddhau samudāgacchati

original: tadyathāpi nāma bhavanto jinaputrāstadeva jātarūpaṃ kāsīsaprakṣiptaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā sarvamalāpagataṃ bhavati,
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma bhavantaḥ jinaputrāḥ tat eva jātarūpam kāsīsa prakṣiptam bhūyasyā mātrayā sarva mala apagatam bhavati

original: evameva bhavanto jinaputrāstadeva jātarūpaṃ kāsīsaprakṣiptaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā sarvamalāpagataṃ bhavati,
analyzed: evam eva bhavantaḥ jinaputrāḥ tat eva jātarūpam kāsīsa prakṣiptam bhūyasyā mātrayā sarva mala apagatam bhavati

original: evameva bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvo'syāṃ vimalāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito'nekān kalpān yāvadanekāni kalpakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi mātsaryadauḥśīlyamalāpanītatayā tyāgaśīlaviśudvau samudāgacchati |
analyzed: evam eva bhavantaḥ jinaputrāḥ bodhisattvaḥ usyām vimalāyām bodhisattva bhūmau sthitaḥ ūnekān kalpān yāvat anekāni kalpa koṭi niyuta śata sahasrāṇi mātsarya dauḥśīlya mala apanīta tayā tyāga śīla viśudvau samudāgacchati

original: tasya caturbhyaḥ saṃgrahavastubhyaḥ priyavadyatā atiriktatamā bhavati |
analyzed: tasya caturbhyaḥ saṃgraha vastubhyaḥ priyavadya tā atiriktatamā bhavati
daśabhyaḥ pāramitābhyaḥ śīla pāramitā atiriktatamā bhavati

original: na ca pariśeṣāsu na samudāgacchati yathābalaṃ yathābhajamānam ||
analyzed: na ca pariśeṣāsu na samudāgacchati yathābalam yathā bhajamānam

original: iyaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvasya vimalā nāma dvitīyā bodhisattvabhūmiḥ samāsanirdeśataḥ,
analyzed: iyam bhavantaḥ jinaputrāḥ bodhisattvasya vimalā nāma dvitīyā bodhisattva bhūmiḥ samāsa nirdeśataḥ

original: yasyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo bhūyastvena rājā bhavati cakravartī caturdvīpādhipatidharmādhipatyapratilabdhaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ kṛtī prabhuḥ sattvānāṃ dauḥśīlyamalavinivartanāya kuśalaḥ sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitum |
analyzed: yasyām pratiṣṭhitaḥ bodhisattvaḥ bhūyastvena rājā bhavati cakravartī catur dvīpa adhipati dharma ādhipatya pratilabdhaḥ sapta ratna samanvāgataḥ kṛtī prabhuḥ sattvānām dauḥśīlya mala vinivartanāya kuśalaḥ sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karma patheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitum
yat ca kiṃcid karma ārabhate peyālam
vimalā nāma dvitīyā bhūmiḥ
prabhākarī nāma tṛtīyā bhūmiḥ

original: vajragarbho bodhisattva āha - yo'yaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvo dvitīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau supariśodhitādhyāśayastṛtīyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmimākramati,
analyzed: vajragarbhaḥ bodhisattvaḥ āha yaḥ yam bhavantaḥ jinaputrāḥ bodhisattvaḥ dvitīyāyām bodhisattva bhūmau su pariśodhita adhyāśayaḥ tṛtīyām bodhisattva bhūmim ākramati
sa daśabhiḥ cittāśaya manaskāraiḥ ākramati
katamaiḥ daśabhiḥ

original: yaduta śuddhacittāśayamanaskāreṇa ca sthiracittāśayamanaskāreṇa ca nirviccittāśayamanaskāreṇa ca avirāgacittāśayamanaskāreṇa ca avinivartacittāśayamanaskāreṇa ca dṛḍhacittāśayamanaskāreṇa ca uttaptacittāśayamanaskāreṇa ca atṛptacittāśayamanaskāreṇa ca udāracittāśayamanaskāreṇa ca māhātmyacittāśayamanaskāreṇa ca |
analyzed: yat uta śuddha citta āśaya manaskāreṇa ca sthira citta āśaya manaskāreṇa ca nirvid citta āśaya manaskāreṇa ca avirāga citta āśaya manaskāreṇa ca avinivarta citta āśaya manaskāreṇa ca dṛḍha citta āśaya manaskāreṇa ca uttapta citta āśaya manaskāreṇa ca atṛpta citta āśaya manaskāreṇa ca udāra citta āśaya manaskāreṇa ca māhātmya citta āśaya manaskāreṇa ca
ebhiḥ daśabhiḥ citta āśaya manaskāraiḥ ākramati

original: sa khalu punarbhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvastṛtīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito'nityatāṃ ca sarvasaṃskāragatasya yathābhūtaṃ pratyavekṣate,
analyzed: sa khalu punar bhavantaḥ jinaputrāḥ bodhisattvaḥ tṛtīyāyām bodhisattva bhūmau sthitaḥ nitya tām ca sarva saṃskāra gatasya yathābhūtam pratyavekṣate

original: duḥkhatāṃ ca aśubhatāṃ ca anāśvāsikatāṃ ca vipralopatāṃ ca acirasthitikatāṃ ca kṣaṇikotpādanirodhatāṃ ca pūrvantāsaṃbhavatāṃ ca aparāntāsaṃkrāntitāṃ ca pratyutpannāvyavasthitatāṃ ca sarvasaṃskāragatasya pratyavekṣate |
analyzed: duḥkha tām ca aśubha tām ca anāśvāsika tām ca vipralopa tām ca acirasthitika tām ca kṣaṇika utpāda nirodha tām ca pūrva anta asaṃbhava tām ca apara anta asaṃkrānti tām ca pratyutpanna avyavasthita tām ca sarva saṃskāra gatasya pratyavekṣate

original: sa evaṃbhūtaṃ sarvasaṃskāragataṃ saṃpaśyannanabhisaraṃ nirākrandaṃ saśokaṃ saparidevaṃ sopāyāsaṃ priyāpriyavinibaddha duḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsābahulamasaṃnicayabhūtaṃ rāgadveṣamohāgnisaṃpradīptamanekavyādhivivardhitaṃ ca ātmabhāvaṃ saṃpaśyan bhūyasyā mātrayā sarvasaṃskārebhyaścittamuccālayati,
analyzed: saḥ evaṃbhūtam sarva saṃskāra gatam saṃpaśyan anabhisaram nirākrandam sa śokam sa paridevam sa upāyāsam priya apriya vinibaddha duḥkha daurmanasya upāyāsa abahulam asaṃnicaya bhūtam rāga dveṣa moha agni saṃpradīptam aneka vyādhi vivardhitam ca ātma bhāvam saṃpaśyan bhūyasyā mātrayā sarva saṃskārebhyaḥ cittam uccālayati
tathāgata jñāne ca saṃpreṣayati
sa tathāgata jñānasya acintya tām ca samanupaśyati

original: atulyatāṃ ca aprameyatāṃ ca durāsadatāṃ ca asaṃspṛṣṭatāṃ ca nirupadravatāṃ ca nirupāyāsatāṃ ca abhayapuragamanīyatāṃ ca apunarāvṛttitāṃ ca bahujanaparitrāṇatāṃ ca samanupaśyati |
analyzed: atulya tām ca aprameya tām ca durāsada tām ca a saṃspṛṣṭa tām ca nirupadrava tām ca nirupāyāsa tām ca abhaya pura gamanīya tām ca apunarāvṛtti tām ca bahu jana paritrāṇa tām ca samanupaśyati

original: sa evamapramāṇatāṃ ca tathāgatajñānasya samanupaśyan evaṃ bahūpadravatāṃ ca sarvasaṃskāragatasya vyupaparīkṣamāṇo bhūyasyā mātrayā sattvānāmantike daśa cittāśayānupasthāpayati |
analyzed: saḥ evam apramāṇa tām ca tathāgata jñānasya samanupaśyan evam bahu upadrava tām ca sarva saṃskāra gatasya vyupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ bhūyasyā mātrayā sattvānām antike daśa citta āśayān upasthāpayati
katamān daśa

original: yaduta anāthātrāṇāpratiśaraṇacittāśayatāṃ ca nityadaridrapratiśaraṇacittāśayatāṃ ca rāgadveṣamohāgnisaṃpradīptapratiśaraṇacittāśayatāṃ ca bhavacārakāvaruddhapratiśaraṇacittāśayatāṃ ca satatasamitaklaśagahenāvṛtaprasuptapratiśaraṇacittāśayatāṃ ca vilokanasamarthapratiśaraṇacittāśayatāṃ ca kuśaladharmacchandarahitapratiśaraṇacittāśayatāṃ ca buddhadharmapramuṣitapratiśaraṇacittāśayatāṃ ca saṃsārasrotonuvāhipratiśaraṇacittāśayatāṃ ca mokṣopāyapraṇaṣṭapratiśaraṇacittāśayatāṃ ca imān daśa cittāśayanupasthāpayati ||
analyzed: yat uta anātha atrāṇā pratiśaraṇa citta āśaya tām ca nitya daridra pratiśaraṇa citta āśaya tām ca rāga dveṣa moha agni saṃpradīpta pratiśaraṇa citta āśaya tām ca bhava cāraka avaruddha pratiśaraṇa citta āśaya tām ca satata samita klaśa gahena āvṛta prasupta pratiśaraṇa citta āśaya tām ca vilokana samartha pratiśaraṇa citta āśaya tām ca kuśala dharma chanda rahita pratiśaraṇa citta āśaya tām ca buddha dharma pramuṣita pratiśaraṇa citta āśaya

original: sa evaṃ bahūpadravaṃ sattvadhātuṃ samanupaśyan evaṃ vīryamārabhate - mayaivaite sattvāḥ paritrātavyāḥ parimocayitavyāḥ paritoṣayitavyāḥ saṃropayitavyā vinetavyāḥ parinirvāpayitavyā iti |
analyzed: saḥ evam bahu upadravam sattvadhātum samanupaśyan evam vīryam ārabhate mayā eva ete sattvāḥ paritrātavyāḥ parimocayitavyāḥ paritoṣayitavyāḥ saṃropayitavyāḥ vinetavyāḥ parinirvāpayitavyāḥ iti

original: sa evaṃ nirvidanugataśca sarvasaṃskāragatyā upekṣānugataśca sarvasattveṣu anuśaṃsānugataśca sarvajñajñāne tathāgatajñānapratiśaraṇaḥ sarvasattvaparitrāṇāyābhiyuktaḥ evaṃ vyupaparīkṣate - katamena khalu upāyamārgeṇa śakyā ime sattvā evaṃ bahuduḥkhopakleśaprapatitā abhyuddhartum,
analyzed: saḥ evam nirvid anugataḥ ca sarva saṃskāra gatyā upekṣā anugataḥ ca sarva sattveṣu anuśaṃsā anugataḥ ca sarvajña jñāne tathāgata jñāna pratiśaraṇaḥ sarva sattva paritrāṇāya abhiyuktaḥ evam vyupaparīkṣate katamena khalu upāya mārgeṇa śakyāḥ ime sattvāḥ evam bahu duḥkha upakleśa prapatitāḥ abhyuddhartum
atyanta sukhe ca nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayitum
sarva dharma niḥsaṃśaya tām ca anuprāpayitum iti
tasya bodhisattvasya evam bhavati na anyatra anāvaraṇa vimokṣa jñāna sthānāt
tat ca anāvaraṇa jñāna vimokṣa sthānam na anyatra sarva dharma yathāvat avabodhāt

original: sa ca sarvadharmayathāvadavabodho nānyatra apracārānutpādacāriṇyāḥ prajñāyāḥ |
analyzed: sa ca sarva dharma yathāvat avabodhaḥ na anyatra a pracāra anutpāda cāriṇyāḥ prajñāyāḥ
sa ca prajñā lokaḥ na anyatra dhyāna kauśalya viniścaya buddhi pratyavekṣaṇāt
tat ca dhyāna kauśalya viniścaya buddhi pratyavekṣaṇam na anyatra śruta kauśalyāt iti

original: sa evaṃ pratyavekṣitajñāno bhūyasyā mātrayā saddharmaparyeṣaṇābhiyukto viharati |
analyzed: saḥ evam pratyavekṣita jñānaḥ bhūyasyā mātrayā saddharma paryeṣaṇa abhiyuktaḥ viharati
rātri divam dharma śravaṇa arthikaḥ dharma kāma atṛpta a pratiprasrabdhaḥ buddhaḥ dharma paryeṣṭi hetoḥ

original: dharmārāmo dharmarato dharmapratiśaraṇo dharmanimno dharmapravaṇo dharmaprāgbhāro dharmaparāyaṇo dharmalayano dharmatrāṇo dharmānudharmacārī
analyzed: dharma ārāmaḥ dharma rataḥ dharma pratiśaraṇaḥ dharma nimnaḥ dharma pravaṇaḥ dharma prāgbhāraḥ dharma parāyaṇaḥ dharma layanaḥ dharma trāṇaḥ dharma anudharma cārī

original: sa evaṃ buddhadharmaparyeṣaṇābhiyukto nāsti tatkiṃcid dravyavittajātaṃ vā dhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgārajātaṃ vā hiraṇyasuvarṇamaṇimuktāvajravaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālajātarūparajatajātaṃ vā yāvatsarvāṅgapratyaṅgaparityāgo vā yanna parityajati tayā dharmakāmatayā |
analyzed: saḥ evam buddha dharma paryeṣaṇa abhiyuktaḥ na asti tat kiṃcid dravya vitta jātam vā dhana dhānya kośa koṣṭhāgāra jātam vā hiraṇya suvarṇa maṇi muktā vajra vaiḍūrya śaṅkha śilā pravāla jātarūpa rajata jātam vā yāvat sarva aṅga pratyaṅga parityāgaḥ vā yat na parityajati tayā dharma kāma tayā

original: na ca tasmādduṣkarasaṃjñī bhavati anyatra tasminneva dharmabhāṇakapudgale duṣkarasaṃjñī bhavati yo'syaikadharmapadamapi deśayati |
analyzed: na ca tasmāt duṣkara saṃjñī bhavati anyatra tasmin eva dharma bhāṇaka pudgale duṣkara saṃjñī bhavati yaḥ usya eka dharma padam api deśayati

original: sa dharmahetornāsti tatkiṃcidupātaṃ bāhyaṃ vastu yanna parityajati |
analyzed: sa dharma hetoḥ nā asti tat kiṃcid upātam bāhyam vastu yat na parityajati
na asti tat kicid dādhyātmikam vastu yat na parityajati
na asti tat kiṃcid guru paricaryā upasthānam yat na upādatte

original: nāsti sā kācid mānābhimānotsarganirmāṇopacāratā yāṃ nopādatte |
analyzed: nā asti sā kācid māna abhimāna utsarga nirmāṇa upacāra tā yām nā upādatte

original: nāsti sā kācitkāyikī pīḍā yāṃ nopādatte |
analyzed: na asti sā kācid kāyikī pīḍā yām na upādatte
sa citraḥ śravaṇena

artha anartha saṃbheda pada kuśala tayā abhijñā nirhāra prāptaḥ ca bhavati

atṛptaḥ ca bhavati puṇya saṃbhāra upacaya tayā
a pratiprasrabdha vīryaḥ ca bhavati jñāna saṃbhāra paryeṣaṇa tayā

rātriṃdivam anya citta parivarjitaḥ ca bhavati sarva sattva paripācana abhiyoga tayā

original: sa evaṃ dhāraṇīprāptaśca bhavati pratibhānaprāptaśca dharmasāṃkathyaṃ saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ sarvāvatīṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuṃ spharitvā yathāśayavibhaktitaḥ sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati dharmāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
analyzed: saḥ evam dhāraṇī prāptaḥ ca bhavati pratibhāna prāptaḥ ca dharma sāṃkathyam saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ sarvāvatīm tri sāhasra mahā sāhasra lokadhātum spharitvā yathā āśaya vibhaktitaḥ sattvebhyaḥ dharmam deśayati dharma āsane niṣaṇṇaḥ

original: dharmāsanaṃ cāsya tathāgatānabhiṣekabhūmiprāptān bodhisattvān sthāpayitvā sarvato viśiṣṭamapramāṇāvabhāsaprāptaṃ bhavati |
analyzed: dharma āsanam ca asya tathāgatān abhiṣeka bhūmi prāptān bodhisattvān sthāpayitvā sarvatas viśiṣṭam apramāṇa avabhāsa prāptam bhavati

original: sa dharmāsane niṣaṇṇa ākāṅkṣan ekaghoṣodāhāreṇa sarvaparṣadaṃ nānāghoṣarutavimātratayā saṃjñāpayati |
analyzed: sa dharma āsane niṣaṇṇaḥ ākāṅkṣan eka ghoṣa udāhāreṇa sarva parṣadam nānā ghoṣa ruta vimātra tayā saṃjñāpayati
ākāṅkṣan nānā ghoṣa nānā svara aṅga vibhaktibhiḥ ājñāpayati
ākāṅkṣan raśmi mukha upasaṃhāraiḥ dharma mukhāni niścārayati
ākāṅkṣan sarva romakūpebhyaḥ ghoṣān niścārayati

original: ākāṅkṣan yāvattrisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau rūpāvabhāsāstebhyaḥ sarvarūpāvabhāsebhyo dharmarutāni niścārayati |
analyzed: ākāṅkṣan yāvat tri sāhasra mahā sāhasrāyām lokadhātau rūpa avabhāsāḥ tebhyaḥ sarva rūpa avabhāsebhyaḥ dharma rutāni niścārayati
ākāṅkṣan eka svara rutena sarva dharmadhātum vijñāpayati
ākāṅkṣan sarva ruta nirghoṣeṣu dharmarutam adhitiṣṭhati
ākāṅkṣan sarva lokadhātu paryāpannebhyaḥ gītā vādya tūrya śabdebhyaḥ dharmarutam niścārayati
ākāṅkṣan eka akṣara rutāt sarva dharma pada prabheda rutam niścārayati

original: ākāṅkṣan anabhilāpyānabhilāpyalokadhātvaparyantataḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyuskandhebhyaḥ sūkṣmaparamāṇurajaḥprabhedata ekaikaparamāṇurajonabhilāpyāni dharmamukhāni niścārayati |
analyzed: ākāṅkṣan anabhilāpya anabhilāpya lokadhātu aparyantataḥ pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyu skandhebhyaḥ sūkṣma paramāṇu rajaḥ prabhedataḥ ekaika paramāṇu rajaḥ anabhilāpyāni dharma mukhāni niścārayati

original: sacettaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparyāpannaḥ sarvasattvā upasaṃkramya ekakṣaṇalavamuhūrtena praśnān paripṛccheyuḥ,
analyzed: saced tam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasra lokadhātu paryāpannaḥ sarva sattvāḥ upasaṃkramyaḥ eka kṣaṇa lava muhūrtena praśnān paripṛccheyuḥ
ekaikaḥ ca teṣām apramāṇa ruta vimātra tayā paripṛcchet

original: yaṃ caikaḥ sattvaḥ paripṛcchenna taṃ dvitīyaḥ,
analyzed: yam ca ekaḥ sattvaḥ paripṛcchet na tam dvitīyaḥ
tam bodhisattvaḥ sarva sattva ruta pada vyañjanam udgṛhṇiyāt

original: udgṛhya caikarutābhivyāhāreṇa teṣāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ cittāśayān paritoṣayet (yāvadanabhilāpyalokadhāturpayāpannā vā sattvā upasaṃkramya ekakṣaṇalavamuhūrtena praśnān paripṛccheyuḥ,
analyzed: udgṛhya ca eka ruta abhivyāhāreṇa teṣām sarva sattvānām citta āśayān paritoṣayet yāvat anabhilāpya lokadhātu ṛpayā āpannāḥ vā sattvāḥ upasaṃkramya eka kṣaṇa lava muhūrtena praśnān paripṛccheyuḥ
ekaikaḥ ca teṣām apramāṇa ruta vimātra tayā paripṛcchet
yam ca ekaḥ paripṛcchet na tam dvitīyaḥ

original: taṃ bodhisattva ekakṣaṇalavamuhūrtenaiva sarvamudgṛhya ekodāhāreṇaiva sarvānājñāpayet |
analyzed: tam bodhisattvaḥ eka kṣaṇa lava muhūrtena eva sarvam udgṛhya eka udāhāreṇa eva sarvān ājñāpayet

original: yāvadanabhilāpyānapi lokadhātūn spharitvā yathāśayendriyādhimuktitaḥ sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati |
analyzed: yāvat anabhilāpyān api lokadhātūn spharitvā yathā āśaya indriya adhimuktitaḥ sattvebhyaḥ dharmam deśayati

original: dharmasāṃkathyaṃ niṣaṇṇaśca tathāgatādhiṣṭhānasaṃpratyeṣakaḥ sakalena buddhakāryeṇa sarvasattvānāṃ pratyupasthito bhavati |
analyzed: dharma sāṃkathyam niṣaṇṇaḥ ca tathāgata adhiṣṭhāna saṃpratyeṣakaḥ sakalena buddha kāryeṇa sarva sattvānām pratyupasthitaḥ bhavati
sa bhūyasyā mātrayā evam jñāna avabhāsa pragrahaṇam ārabhate

original: sacedekasmin vālāgraprasare yāvantyanabhilāpyeṣu lokadhātuṣu paramāṇurajāṃsi tāvantastathāgatāstāvadapramāṇaprāpteṣveva parṣanmaṇḍaleṣu dharmaṃ deśayeyuḥ |
analyzed: saced ekasmin vāla agra prasare yāvanti anabhilāpyeṣu lokadhātuṣu paramāṇu rajāṃsi tāvantaḥ tathāgatāḥ tāvat apramāṇa prāpteṣu eva parṣad maṇḍaleṣu dharmam deśayeyuḥ

original: ekaikaśca tathāgatastāvadapramāṇaprāptebhyaḥ sarvasattvebhyo nānātvato dharmaṃ deśayet,
analyzed: ekaikaḥ ca tathāgataḥ tāvat apramāṇa prāptebhyaḥ sarva sattvebhyaḥ nānātvataḥ dharmam deśayet

original: yathā caikastathāgataḥ parṣanmaṇḍale tathā te sarve tathāgatāḥ |

original: tatrāsmābhistādṛśaṃ smṛtivaipulyamabhinirhartavyaṃ yathaikakṣaṇena sarvatathāgatānāṃ sakāśāddharmāvabhāsaṃ pratyeṣemahi ekarutāvyatirekāt |

original: tatrāsmābhistādṛśaṃ prajñāvabhāsaviniścayapratibhānaṃ pariśodhyaṃ yadekakṣaṇena sarvasattvān paritoṣayet,
analyzed: tatra asmābhiḥ tādṛśam prajñā avabhāsa viniścaya pratibhānam pariśodhyam yat eka kṣaṇena sarva sattvān paritoṣayet
kim punar iyatsu lokadhātuṣu sattvāni

original: sa imāṃ sādhumatīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimanuprāpto bodhisattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā rātriṃdivamananyamanasikāraprayukto bhūtvā buddhagocarānupraviṣṭastathāgatasamavadhānaprāpto gambhīrabodhisattvavimokṣānuprāpto bhavati |
analyzed: saḥ imām sādhumatīm bodhisattva bhūmim anuprāptaḥ bodhisattvaḥ bhūyasyā mātrayā rātriṃdivam an anya manasikāra prayuktaḥ bhūtvā buddha gocara anupraviṣṭaḥ tathāgata samavadhāna prāptaḥ gambhīra bodhisattva vimokṣa anuprāptaḥ bhavati

analyzed: saḥ evam jñāna anugataḥ bodhisattvaḥ samāhitaḥ tathāgata darśanam na vijahāti
ekaikasmin ca kalpena ikān buddhān
anekāni buddha śatāni anekāni buddha koṭi nayuta śata sahasrāṇi

original: evameva bho jinaputrā bodhisattvasya asyāṃ sādhumatyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya tāni kuśalamūlāni mahājñānāloka suvibhaktānyuttapyante,
analyzed: evam eva bho jinaputrāḥ bodhisattvasya asyām sādhumatyām bodhisattva bhūmau sthitasya tāni kuśala mūlāni mahā jñāna āloka su vibhaktāni uttapyante

original: vajragarbho bodhisattva āha - yo'yaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattva evamapramāṇajñeyavicāritayā buddhyā yāvannavamī bodhisattvabhūmiriti suvicitavicayaḥ suparipūrṇaśukladharmaḥ paryantasaṃbhāropacayopacitaḥ suparigṛhītamahāpuṇyajñānasaṃbhāraḥ mahākaruṇāvaipulyādhigataḥ lokadhātuvibhaktivaimātryakovidaḥ sattvadhātupraviṣṭagahanopacāraḥ tathāgatagocarapraveśānugatasaṃjñāmanasikāraḥ balavaiśāradyabuddhadharmādhyālambanānugataḥ sarvākārasarvajñajñānābhiṣekabhūmiprāpta ityucyate ||

original: tasya khalu punarbhavanto jinaputrā evaṃjñānānugatasya bodhisattvasya abhiṣekabhūmisamāpannasya vimalo nāma samādhirāmukhībhavati |

sāgaragarbhaḥ ca nāma
sāgarasamṛddhiḥ ca nāma
ākāśadhātuvipulaḥ ca nāma
sarvadharmasvabhāvavicayaḥ ca nāma

daśa samādhi asaṃkhyeya śata sahasrāṇi āmukhībhavanti

original: sa tān sarvān samādhīn samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca,

original: yasmin samanantarābhimukhībhūte daśatrisāhasraśatasahasrāparyantapramāṇaṃ mahāratnarājapadmaṃ prādurbhavati sarvākārararatnapratyarpitaṃ sarvalokaviṣayasamatikrāntaṃ lokottarakuśalamūlasaṃbhūtaṃ māyāsvabhāvagocarapariniṣpannaṃ dharmadhātusuvyavasthitāvabhāsaṃ divyaviṣayasamatikrāntaṃ mahāvaiḍūryamaṇiratnadaṇḍamatulyacandanarājakarṇikaṃ mahāśmagarbhakesaraṃ jāmbūnadasuvarṇāvabhāsapatramaparimitaraśmisaṃkusumitaśarīraṃ sarvapravararatnapratyuptagarbhamaparyantamahāratnajālasaṃchannaṃ paripūrṇadaśatrisāhasraśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamamahāratnapadmaparivāram |
analyzed: yasmin samanantara abhimukhībhūte daśa tri sāhasra śata sahasra aparyanta pramāṇam mahā ratna rāja padmam prādurbhavati sarva ākāra raratna pratyarpitam sarva loka viṣaya samatikrāntam lokottara kuśala mūla saṃbhūtam māyā svabhāva gocara pariniṣpannam dharmadhātu su vyavasthita avabhāsam divya viṣaya samatikrāntam mahā vaiḍūrya maṇi ratna daṇḍam atulya candana rāja karṇikam mahā aśmagarbha kesaram jāmbūnada suvarṇa avabhāsa patram aparimita raśmi saṃkus
tad anugataḥ tad anurūpaḥ ca tasya bodhisattvasya kāyaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate

original: sa tasya sarvajñajñānaviśeṣābhiṣekavataḥ samādheḥ sahapratilambhāttasminmahāratnarājapadme niṣaṇṇaḥ saṃdṛśyate |

original: atha yāvanti tasya mahāratnarājapadmasya mahāpadmāni parivāraḥ prādurbhūtaḥ,
analyzed: atha yāvanti tasya mahā ratna rāja padmasya mahā padmāni parivāraḥ prādurbhūtaḥ

kuryāt praṇāmam api ca eka vāram
prasanna cittā utha vadet namaḥ ūrhan
tasmāt idam śreṣṭhataram ca puṇyam
buddhāḥ bhaveyuḥ yadi
stān pūjayet yaḥ ca yathā eva pūrvam
divyaiḥ ca puṣpaiḥ atha mānuṣaiḥ ca
kalpān anekān bahubhiḥ prakāraiḥ
yaḥ ca eva saddharma vilopa kāle
tyaktvā sva kāyam ca tathā ātma jīvam
dadyāt ahar rātram idam hi sūtram
viśiṣyate puṇyam idam hi tasmāt
yasya īpsitam pūjayitum jinendrān
pratyekabuddhān api śrāvakān ca
dṛḍham samutpādya sa bodhi cittam
idam sadā sūtra varam dadātu
rājā hi ayam sarva su bhāṣitānām
sobhudgataḥ sarva tathāgata nāma
gṛhe sthitaḥ tasya tathāgataḥ sa
tiṣṭhet idam yatra hi sūtra ratnam
prabhām sa prāpnoti śubhām anantām
ekam padam vādi śatīhayaḥ ca
na vyañjanāt grasyati na api ca arthāt
dadāti yaḥ sūtram idam parebhyaḥ
anuttarā asau nara nāyakānām
sattvaḥ na kaścid sadṛśaḥ asya vidyate
bhavet samudreṇa samaḥ ca sa ukṣayaḥ
śrutvā hi yaḥ dharmam imam prapadyate
